original_text: It is true that you have had five husbands. And now you live with a man who is not your husband. What you have said is completely true.’
korean_text: 너에게 남편 다섯이 있었고 지금 있는 자도 네 남편이 아니니 네 말이 참되도다

sentences.original_text: It is true that you have had five husbands.
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 다섯 남편을 가졌던 것은 사실이다.

sentences.original_text: And now you live with a man
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 지금 너는 한 남자와 함께 살고 있다.

sentences.original_text: What you have said is completely true.'
